text_sections.section_3: As our campus is still under development, UTN is currently spread across multiple locations. Large parts of the administration, as well as the Founding Executive Board (https://www.utn.de/en/organisation/founding-executive-board/) , have already moved into the first building on campus – Cube One. The departments Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence (https://www.utn.de/en/departments/department-computer-science-artificial-intelligence/) and Liberal Arts and Social Sciences (https://www.utn.de/en/departments/department-liberal-arts-and-social-sciences/) , as well as the StaRs Unit (https://www.utn.de/en/study/contact-stars/) , are still located in the interim building on Ulmenstraße.
text_sections.section_7: U1 direction Langwasser Süd, exit Bauernfeindstraße (approx. 300 m by foot)
text_sections.section_9: From the city center via Münchener Straße. Dr.-Luise-Herzberg-Straße turns off Münchener Straße to the west into the southern part of the campus of the Technical University of Nuremberg.
text_sections.section_10: Please note that only a limited number of visitor parking spaces are available on the campus ground. Please ask your contact person in advance whether a reservation is possible.
text_sections.section_14: Line 5 direction Worzeldorfer Straße, exit: Siemensstraße (approx. 500 m by foot)
text_sections.section_16: U1 direction Langwasser Süd, exit: Frankenstraße (approx. 1000 m by foot)
text_sections.section_17: Optional: Continue with bus line 65 direction Röthenbach, exit: Markgrafenstraße (approx. 200 m by foot)
text_sections.section_19: A limited number of visitor parking spaces are available next to the main entrance. Please clarify in advance with your contact person whether a reservation is possible.
